description: [Winter Vivern](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1035) has mimicked legitimate government-related domains to deliver malicious webpages containing links to documents or other content for user execution.(Citation: SentinelOne WinterVivern 2023)(Citation: CERT-UA WinterVivern 2023)

external_references.description: CERT-UA. (2023, February 1). UAC-0114 aka Winter Vivern to target Ukrainian and Polish GOV entities (CERT-UA#5909). Retrieved July 29, 2024.
Tom Hegel. (2023, March 16). Winter Vivern | Uncovering a Wave of Global Espionage. Retrieved July 29, 2024.
